full_summary:
### Rock and Gravel Crushing Operations

#### Tender Notice
**Publication Date:** January 18, 2024
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 28, 2024, 2:00 pm EST

This solicitation, part of Amendment 1, aims to procure a provider for Rock and Gravel Crushing Operations on Garrison Petawawa Lands, Ranges, and Training Areas. The successful contractor will be responsible for supplying all supervision, labour, materials, tools, equipment, and transportation needed for these operations, which will be carried out on an as-and-when-requested basis.

#### Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit is scheduled to take place on January 31, 2024, at 101 Menin Rd, Garrison Petawawa, Ontario. The visit will begin at 10:00 am EST in Building S-111, Room B116. Bidders are required to confirm their attendance by January 24, 2024, at 2:00 pm EST, and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend. Attendance will be recorded on an attendance sheet, and bidders should confirm their participation in their bid. Failure to attend the mandatory site visit or send a representative will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Tender Requirements
Bidders are expected to provide all necessary supervision, labour, materials, tools, equipment, and transportation to conduct the Rock and Gravel Crushing Operations. The tender includes provision for the as-and-when-requested requirement.

#### Important Dates

* January 24, 2024, 2:00 pm EST: Deadline for bidder confirmation of attendance and provision of attendee names for the mandatory site visit.
* January 31, 2024: Mandatory site visit.
* February 28, 2024, 2:00 pm EST: Tender closing date and time.

#### Contract Details

The contract is expected to begin on April 1, 2024, with no specified end date. The solicitation is for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) under Competitive - Open Bidding.
